MESSAGE.content: <agent>: FW-1: State synchronization is in risk. Please examine your synchronization network to avoid further problems !
<agent>: FW-1: <process>: delta sync connection with member <id> was lost and regained. <fld1> updates were lost

MESSAGE.functions: <@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@:*SYSVAL($MSGID,$ID1)><@event_description:Warning: Interface not protected by the anti-spoofing feature>
MESSAGE.content: <agent>: FW-1: <severity>: The <interface> interface is not protected by the anti-spoofing feature
<agent>: FW-1: <severity>: The connections table is <dclass_ratio1>% full.
<agent>:<space>New connections will be dropped once the connection table reaches
<agent>:<space>full capacity. Please consider increasing the connections table limit.
<agent>: FW-1: fw_kfree: wrong magic number at tail end of <fld1> caller is 'msn_save_buf' sz=<fld2>
<agent>:<space>Your network may be at risk. In the future, it is recommended that you
<agent>:<space>define anti-spoofing protection before installing the Security Policy.
<agent>: FW-1: stopping debug messages for the next <duration> seconds
